pr_title: TRUNK-5702: Order Patient Programs By Enrollment Date

timeline.bodyText: Thanks for this @trustbirungi , Now i was suggesting to try using AssertEquals  or assertTrue since we are upgrading to junit5, like here however cc @dkayiwa , @ibacher ,@teleivo   your suggestion about asserts
timeline.author: sherrif10

replies.bodyText:
This assertEquals seem alright to me.
Or do you mean another line in this PR? Since that one was not changed in this PR.
replies.author: teleivo

replies.bodyText: No thanks i meant the very one. thanks, i first saw it like needed to be changed
replies.author: sherrif10

replies.bodyText: @sherrif10 @teleivo I'd like to suggest that this be done in a separate PR so as to maintain the atomicity of this PR.
replies.author: trustbirungi

replies.bodyText: no change is requested so nothing to do :)
replies.author: teleivo

timeline.message: TRUNK-5702: Ordered patient programs by enrollment date

timeline.bodyText: Since we are migrating to JUnit 5, do you mind taking a look at this for the very small changes that you need to make? https://wiki.openmrs.org/display/docs/How+to+migrate+to+JUnit+5
timeline.author: dkayiwa

replies.bodyText: The ProgramWorkflowDAOTest is already running on JUnit 5 in the current master. So please rebase your changes on the current master. We put our static imports on top, can you please make sure you configure that in your IDE see https://wiki.openmrs.org/display/docs/How-To+Setup+And+Use+Your+IDE
replies.author: teleivo

replies.bodyText: @dkayiwa @teleivo I've updated the tests to JUnit5. I've also configured my IDE and reformatted my code as per the style guides. Thanks.
replies.author: trustbirungi
